snippet: Officials said that the revamped HealthCare.gov would not crash, and that most signing up for the first time would visit much fewer screens.
abstract: Obama administration officials say that consumers will find it easier to buy health insurance in federal marketplace in fall, and that HealthCare.gov will not crash; officials, however, provide few operational details to back up their confidential statements.
lead_paragraph: Officials said that the revamped HealthCare.gov would not crash, and that most signing up for the first time would visit much fewer screens.

headline.main: Easier Time in Health Marketplace Is Promised
headline.print_headline: Easier Time in Health Marketplace Is Promised

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
